name: FlexiShare Pro – Customizable Floating Share Button
author: Pawan Jagriti

sections.description:
FlexiShare Pro adds a customizable floating share button to your website. Choose positioning, color, and even a fallback modal for maximum engagement.

Short Description

A customizable floating share button plugin for WordPress. Allows users to add a share button with customizable positioning, color, and a fallback modal for increased social engagement.

Key Features:
* Floating share button with customizable background color.
* Position the button on the left or right side of the screen.
* Enable or disable the share button from the settings.
* Optional fallback modal for additional sharing options.
* Responsive design to work across all devices.
* Easy to use, with no coding required.

Use Cases:
* Increase social media sharing on your WordPress site.
* Engage visitors with easy-to-access share options.
* Customize the button appearance to match your website design.

How it Works:
Once activated, the plugin will automatically display a share button. You can easily control its appearance and functionality from the settings page, allowing complete customization.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. You can modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the flexishare-pro folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Settings > FlexiShare Pro to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I customize the share button’s appearance?

Yes, you can customize the share button’s background color and position (left or right) from the settings.

Does this plugin support a fallback modal?

Yes, the fallback modal is an optional feature that can be enabled or disabled in the settings.

Is the plugin responsive?

Absolutely! The plugin is designed to work on all screen sizes, ensuring the share button remains functional on mobile and desktop devices.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release of FlexiShare Pro – Customizable Floating Share Button.
  • Added options to customize button color and position.
  • Added fallback modal feature.
